title: Update a BI reservation
description: Update the size of an existing BI reservation. The BigQuery BI Engine uses BI reservations to run fast, in-memory analysis.

objective.narrative: Programmatically adjust the size of a BigQuery BI Engine reservation to automate scaling operations. This optimizes for cost and performance based on fluctuating analytical workloads.

regionTags.name: bigqueryreservation_v1_reservationservice_bireservation_update
regionTags.title: Update a BI reservation
